subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: As Louisville prepares to visit Rutgers on Thursday night in a battle of 8-0 teams, the Cardinals’ offense is among the nation’s best, but the Knights rank second in scoring defense, giving up only 9.1 points per game.
snippet: As Louisville prepares to visit Rutgers on Thursday night in a battle of 8-0 teams, the Cardinals’ offense is among the nation’s best, but the Knights rank second in scoring defense, giving up only 9.1 points per game.
